instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3435: What is 820-3435? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.PPVRTC_G3H: What is PPVRTC_G3H? PPVRTC_G3H is a 3.3v power rail for the RTC circuit present when the machine is in a G3H global system hardware off state. .

threads.title: Macbook Air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3435</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B not turning on
threads.message: Hi all, rather than me try to type out an explanation, I've done a short video to show what I've done and my sticking points... Please help

threads.title: Macbook Air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3435</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B not turning on
threads.message: Is <SIGNAL>PPVRTC_G3H</SIGNAL> shorted to ground? If it is and you have removed <CHIP>U1900</CHIP> and all of the caps on that line, the CPU is dead.

threads.title: Macbook Air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3435</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B not turning on
threads.message:
Yes it is, and yes I have - Damn :( 

Thank you for  confirming my thoughts

threads.title: Macbook Air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3435</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B not turning on
threads.message:
Please post voltages and/or resistance to ground on basic points.
I don't plan to watch the video any time I have to post a reply...

We need to "see" available data in a fast way.

threads.title: Macbook Air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3435</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B not turning on
threads.message:
Apologies, I felt it was a concise way to show you exactly what had been done

Basically, <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3HOT</SIGNAL> is 8.58V - so good
PP3V42 is good

The first point which falls down is  <SIGNAL>PPVRTC_G3H</SIGNAL>. There's no voltage here, and with <CHIP>U1900</CHIP>, and the 4 other caps on the line all removed from the board, the resistance to GND is 0.4 Ohms

threads.title: Macbook Air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3435</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B not turning on
threads.message: Then PCH is bad; no other component remains there...
